title: CA to witness flypast, paratrooping at Tejgaon Parade Ground on Victory Day
body: Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus will witness the flypast and paratrooping by the Bangladesh Army, Navy and Air Force at Tejgaon Parade Ground as part of the celebrations of the Great Victory Day on December 16. This was said in a release issued by the Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) Directorate this afternoon. Meanwhile, the final rehearsal of the event will be held at Tejgaon Parade Ground tomorrow at 10:30am, the ISPR added.
